verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> Then David זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> This [is] the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this מִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <S%H4196><s%> and this [is] the altar לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> for Israel ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> commanded דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David לִכְנוֹס֙ <S%H3664><s%> to gather together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגֵּרִ֔ים <S%H1616><s%> the strangers אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [were] in the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and he set חֹֽצְבִ֗ים <S%H2672><s%> masons לַחְצוֹב֙ <S%H2672><s%> to hew אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stones גָזִ֔ית <S%H1496><s%> wrought לִבְנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וּבַרְזֶ֣ל ׀ <S%H1270><s%> iron לָ֠רֹב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance לַֽמִּסְמְרִ֞ים <S%H4548><s%> for the nails לְדַלְת֧וֹת <S%H1817><s%> for the doors הַשְּׁעָרִ֛ים <S%H8179><s%> of the gates וְלַֽמְחַבְּר֖וֹת <S%H4226><s%> and for the joinings הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> prepared דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> And David וּנְחֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brass לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without מִשְׁקָֽל׃ <S%H4948><s%> without weight

וַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֖ים <S%H730><s%> Also cedar לְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> beyond מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> number כִּֽי <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֠בִיאוּ <S%H935><s%> brought הַצִּֽידֹנִ֨ים <S%H6722><s%> for the Zidonians וְהַצֹּרִ֜ים <S%H6876><s%> and they of Tyre עֲצֵ֧י <S%H6086><s%> wood אֲרָזִ֛ים <S%H730><s%> cedar לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> much לְדָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> to David פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> And David שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנִי֮ <S%H1121><s%> my son נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> [is] young וָרָךְ֒ <S%H7390><s%> and tender וְהַבַּ֜יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the house לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> [that is] to be builded לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לְהַגְדִּ֨יל ׀ <S%H1431><s%> magnifical לְמַ֜עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> [must be] exceeding לְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> of fame וּלְתִפְאֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H8597><s%> and of glory לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> throughout all countries אָכִ֥ינָה <S%H3559><s%> I will [therefore] now make preparation נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now ל֑וֹ וַיָּ֧כֶן <S%H3559><s%> prepared דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> for it So David לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> abundantly לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> his death

וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> Then he called לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> for Solomon בְנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6680><s%> and charged לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> him to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> And David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon [בְּנֹו כ] (בְּנִ֕י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted ק) אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with לְבָבִ֔י <S%H3824><s%> as for me it was in my mind לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> unto the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> But דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> But the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> came to me saying דָּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> blood לָרֹב֙ <S%H7230><s%> abundantly שָׁפַ֔כְתָּ <S%H8210><s%> Thou hast shed וּמִלְחָמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> wars גְּדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and hast made לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> thou shalt not build בַ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> unto my name כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because דָּמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> blood רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> much שָׁפַ֥כְתָּ <S%H8210><s%> because thou hast shed אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> upon the earth לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> in my sight

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בֵ֞ן <S%H1121><s%> Behold a son נוֹלָ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> shall be born לָ֗ךְ ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall be a אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to thee who shall be a man מְנוּחָ֔ה <S%H4496><s%> of rest וַהֲנִח֥וֹתִי <S%H5117><s%> and I will give him rest ל֛וֹ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אוֹיְבָ֖יו <S%H341><s%> from all his enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> shall be Solomon יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> for his name וְשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וָשֶׁ֛קֶט <S%H8253><s%> and quietness אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and I will give עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel בְּיָמָֽיו׃ <S%H3117><s%> in his days

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He יִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> He shall build בַ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> for my name וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> and he shall be my son וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I ל֖וֹ לְאָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> and I [will be] his father וַהֲכִ֨ינוֹתִ֜י <S%H3559><s%> and I will establish כִּסֵּ֧א <S%H3678><s%> the throne מַלְכוּת֛וֹ <S%H4438><s%> of his kingdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> Now my son יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> that וְהִצְלַחְתָּ֗ <S%H6743><s%> be with thee and prosper וּבָנִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1129><s%> thou and build בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> as he hath said עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> concerning

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only יִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> give לְּךָ֤ יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Only the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> thee wisdom וּבִינָ֔ה <S%H998><s%> and understanding וִֽיצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> and give thee charge עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> concerning Israel וְלִשְׁמ֕וֹר <S%H8104><s%> that thou mayest keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then תַּצְלִ֔יחַ <S%H6743><s%> Then shalt thou prosper אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תִּשְׁמ֗וֹר <S%H8104><s%> if thou takest heed לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> to fulfil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> the statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> charged יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> with concerning Israel חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> be strong וֶאֱמָ֔ץ <S%H553><s%> and of good courage אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> dread וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֵּחָֽת׃ <S%H2865><s%> not nor be dismayed

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בְעָנְיִ֜י <S%H6040><s%> Now behold in my trouble הֲכִינ֣וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> I have prepared לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> for the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD זָהָ֞ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold כִּכָּרִ֤ים <S%H3603><s%> talents מֵֽאָה־ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וְכֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> and a thousand אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּכָּרִ֔ים <S%H3603><s%> talents וְלַנְּחֹ֤שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and of brass וְלַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> and iron אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> beyond מִשְׁקָ֔ל <S%H4948><s%> without weight כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> are in לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> for it is in abundance הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְעֵצִ֤ים <S%H6086><s%> timber וַאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> also and stone הֲכִינ֔וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> have I prepared וַעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and you תּוֹסִֽיף׃ <S%H3254><s%> and thou mayest add

וְעִמְּךָ֤ <S%H5973><s%> there לָרֹב֙ <S%H7230><s%> with thee in abundance עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> accomplish מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> for every manner of work חֹצְבִ֕ים <S%H2672><s%> hewers וְחָרָשֵׁ֥י <S%H2796><s%> and workers אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone וָעֵ֑ץ <S%H6086><s%> and timber וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> and all manner of cunning men בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> of work

לַזָּהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> Of the gold לַכֶּ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver וְלַנְּחֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and the brass וְלַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> and the iron אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> [there is] no number ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise וַעֲשֵׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> [therefore] and be doing וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> also

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> also commanded דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעְזֹ֖ר <S%H5826><s%> to help לִשְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> is not יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> [Is] not the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> not וְהֵנִ֥יחַ <S%H5117><s%> with you? and hath he [not] given you rest לָכֶ֖ם מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> every כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> into בְּיָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> into mine hand אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְנִכְבְּשָׁ֥ה <S%H3533><s%> is subdued הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> Now set לְבַבְכֶם֙ <S%H3824><s%> your heart וְנַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> and your soul לִדְר֖וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְק֗וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> arise וּבְנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> therefore and build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדַּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> ye the sanctuary יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God לְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּכְלֵי֙ <S%H3627><s%> vessels קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and the holy הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house הַנִּבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> that is to be built לְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> to the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ
